column1: The House of the Wing was one of the Twelve Houses of the Gondolindrim led by Tuor.  They wore wings as of swans or gulls upon their helms
column2: and the emblem of the White Wing was upon their shields.  Its people were the stoutest folk of Gondolin. The House of the Wing was apparently one of the smaller houses
column3: for those from the House of the Mole outnumbered them when they came to arms during the Fall of Gondolin.  They fought alongside the House of the Fountain at the breach in the wall. Outnumbered by the great hosts of Morgoth
column4: they joined the surviving houses at the Square of the King. From there
column5: most of its people went on before the rest of the exiles during the escape through Idrils secret way
column6: cutting their way out of the hosts of Orcs
column8: making it to the mountains.  They were under Hendor
column10: who carried Eärendil upon his back.
